name: Evil Cogs
description: Dark fairy-tale about little beam of light. Explore the strange and mystic world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
